price: 113. Kaadu kaa (Ibraahim) kee Iscaaqhal barkat oobisne, kaadu ken nammayih samadak isi nafsih meqe num keenik yaniih, baxxaqqa-le dulmih koroosannut isi nafsi yadlume num keenit yanih.
arabic: وَبَٰرَكۡنَا عَلَيۡهِ وَعَلَىٰٓ إِسۡحَٰقَۚ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِهِمَا مُحۡسِنٞ وَظَالِمٞ لِّنَفۡسِهِۦ مُبِينٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wabāraknā ʿalayhi waʿalā is'ḥāqa wamin dhurriyyatihimā muḥ'sinun waẓālimun linafsihi mubīnun
